<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">cat_item=03fb2d1a1b7a451062e50ed2cd4bcb6a^approvalCHANGESTOapproved^EQ<item display_table="sc_cat_item" display_value="OneStream Access Request" endquery="false" field="cat_item" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="03fb2d1a1b7a451062e50ed2cd4bcb6a"/><item display_value="Approved" endquery="false" field="approval" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="approved"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Onestream Wait for Approval or Task</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	try {
		var inputs = {};
		inputs['ritm_record'] = current; // GlideRecord of table: sc_req_item 
				
		// Execute Synchronously: Run in foreground. Code snippet has access to outputs.
		var result = sn_fd.FlowAPI.getRunner().subflow('x_apig_onestream_a.wait_for_approval_or_task').inForeground().withInputs(inputs).run();
		var outputs = result.getOutputs();

		// Get Outputs:
		// Note: outputs can only be retrieved when executing synchronously.
		var ritmorapprovaloutput = outputs['ritmorapprovaloutput']; // Choice
		
		if (ritmorapprovaloutput.toString() == 'Approval'){
			current.approval = previous.approval;
		}
		
	} catch (ex) {
		var message = ex.getMessage();
		gs.error(message);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-17 20:23:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5d6d54171b48d9508c5143f3cc4bcb54</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Onestream Wait for Approval or Task</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OneStream Access Request" source="x_apig_onestream_a">90eb291a1b7a451062e50ed2cd4bcb5e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OneStream Access Request">90eb291a1b7a451062e50ed2cd4bcb5e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5d6d54171b48d9508c5143f3cc4bcb54</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-22 15:08:14</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5d6d54171b48d9508c5143f3cc4bcb54"/></record_update>
